name: Gaax Inc. Launcher
description:
This launcher will be required for later games to update, reinstall if the game gets corrupt, easily uninstall a game and install now game easy.

Official release: 03.06.2021 10:00 EEST

Minimum Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7 or newer (32 Bit and 64 Bit, no ARM version sorry)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD at 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated graphics that has 64 video ram or more.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended Requirements

  • Processor: Intel or AMD at 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated graphics that has 128 video ram or more.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
